name: The Forgotten Gods Event: Game Design and Technical Decision-Making in Live and Onchain Competitions
description: In this session, we’ll delve into the “Forgotten Gods” event, a three-week competition that unfolded within our onchain game, Pirate Nation. We’ll reflect on the intriguing social dynamics that emerged, such as faction-switching and player recruitment strategies, as well as the technical hurdles we faced, including issues like botting, community-created clients, and item burning. This discussion will provide valuable insights for developers interested in running their own engaging onchain game competitions.

speakers.name: Matt Van
speakers.bio: Matt Van is the Head of Engineering of Proof of Play, a company on a mission to create compelling and fun onchain games that facilitate an inclusive and creative web3 ecosystem.
